00007 inline void psstream_impl::outlineshow(const char* text)
00008 {
00009   if (!has_outlineshow)
00010   {
00011     std::ofstream app(setup_section, std::ios::app);
00012     app << "/ws (X) def /spreadproc { ws false charpath gsave 1 setlinecap 1\n"
00013       "setlinejoin 2 setlinewidth 1 setgray stroke grestore currentpoint\n"
00014       "newpath exch 2 add exch moveto } def /letterproc { ws false charpath\n"
00015       "gsave 0 setgray fill grestore gsave 0.25 setlinewidth stroke grestore\n"
00016       "currentpoint newpath exch 2 add exch moveto } def /outlineshow { dup\n"
00017       "gsave { ws exch 0 exch put spreadproc } forall grestore gsave { ws exch\n"
00018       "0 exch put letterproc } forall grestore } def\n";
00019     has_outlineshow = true;
00020   }
00021   out << '(' << text << ") outlineshow\n";
00022 }

00175 
00176 inline void psstream_impl::textproc()
00177 {
00178   if (!has_textproc)
00179   {
00180     std::ofstream app(setup_section, std::ios::app);
00181     app << "/widen_path 1 def /pi 3.1415926535897932384626433832795 def /tsize\n"
00182       "{ gsave 0 0 moveto true charpath flattenpath pathbbox grestore /y2 exch\n"
00183       "widen_path add def /x2 exch widen_path add def /y1 exch widen_path sub def\n"
00184       "/x1 exch widen_path sub def matrix currentmatrix } bind def /tplot { { x1\n"
00185       "neg y1 neg moveto show } { pop 0 0 moveto x2 x1 sub 0 rlineto 0 y2 y1 sub\n"
00186       "rlineto x1 x2 sub 0 rlineto 0 y1 y2 sub rlineto } ifelse setmatrix end }\n"
00187       "bind def /ltext { 10 dict begin /f exch def /s exch def /a exch def /r exch\n"
00188       "def /y exch def /x exch def s tsize x y translate a rotate r y2 y1 sub -2\n"
00189       "div translate s f tplot } bind def /rtext { 10 dict begin /f exch def /s\n"
00190       "exch def /a exch def /r exch def /y exch def /x exch def s tsize x y\n"
00191       "translate a rotate x1 x2 sub r sub y2 y1 sub -2 div translate s f tplot\n"
00192       "} bind def /annot { 9 dict begin /f exch def /s exch def /a exch def /y\n"
00193       "exch def /x exch def s tsize x y translate a rotate x2 x1 sub -2 div y2\n"
00194       "y1 sub -2 div translate s f tplot } bind def /label { 17 dict begin /f\n"
00195       "exch def /s exch def /d exch def /r exch def /y exch def /x exch def s\n"
00196       "tsize /dy y2 y1 sub def /dx x2 x1 sub def /ss 0.5 pi mul r mul def /dd\n"
00197       "2 ss mul dx add dy add 2 mul def /d dx dy add pi r mul add d mul def d 0\n"
00198       "lt { /d d dup neg dd div floor cvi 1 add dd mul add def } if d dd ge { /d\n"
00199       "d dup dd div floor cvi dd mul sub def } if /d1 0.0 def /d2 0.5 dy mul def\n"
00200       "d d2 lt { x r add y d add d2 sub } { /d1 d2 def /d2 d2 ss add def d d2 lt\n"
00201       "{ /a d d1 sub 90 mul ss div def x r a cos mul add y r a sin mul add } {\n"
00202       "/d1 d2 def /d2 d2 dx add def d d2 lt { x d d1 sub sub y r add } { /d1 d2\n"
00203       "def /d2 d2 ss add def d d2 lt { /a d d1 sub ss add 90 mul ss div def x dx\n"
00204       "sub r a cos mul add y r a sin mul add } { /d1 d2 def /d2 d2 dy add def d d2\n"
00205       "lt { x dx sub r sub y d d1 sub sub } { /d1 d2 def /d2 d2 ss add def d d2 lt\n"
00206       "{ /a d d1 sub 2 ss mul add 90 mul ss div def x r a cos mul add dx sub y r a\n"
00207       "sin mul add dy sub } { /d1 d2 def /d2 d2 dx add def d d2 lt { x dx sub d d1\n"
00208       "sub add y dy sub r sub } { /d1 d2 def /d2 d2 ss add def d d2 lt { /a d d1 sub\n"
00209       "3 ss mul add 90 mul ss div def x r a cos mul add y r a sin mul add dy sub }\n"
00210       "{ x r add y d d2 sub add dy sub } ifelse } ifelse } ifelse } ifelse } ifelse\n"
00211       "} ifelse } ifelse } ifelse translate s f tplot } bind def\n";
00212     has_textproc = true;
00213   }
00214 }
00215 
00216 inline void psstream_impl::initarray()
00217 {
00218   if (!has_initarray)
00219   {
00220     std::ofstream app(setup_section, std::ios::app);
00221     app << "/initarray { 0 { currentfile 256 string readline not { pop exit } if { token\n"
00222       "not { exit } if 3 index exch 3 index exch put exch 1 add exch 2 index length 2 index\n"
00223       "eq { pop exit } if } loop 1 index length 1 index eq { exit } if } loop pop } bind def\n";
00224     has_initarray = true;
00225   }
00226 }
00227 
00228 inline void psstream_impl::label_textproc(double x, double y, double r, 
00229   double d, const char* s, bool f)
00230 {
00231   textproc();
00232   out << x << ' ' << y << ' ' << r << ' '  << d << " (" << s << ") " \
00233     << (f? "true": "false") << " label\n";
00234 }
00235 
00236 inline void psstream_impl::annot_textproc(double x, double y, double a, 
00237   const char* s, bool f)
00238 {
00239   textproc();
00240   out << x << ' ' << y << ' ' << a << " (" << s << ") " \
00241     << (f? "true": "false") << " annot\n";
00242 }
00243 
00244 inline void psstream_impl::ltext_textproc(double x, double y, double r, \
00245   double a, const char* s, bool f)
00246 {
00247   textproc();
00248   out << x << ' ' << y << ' ' << r << ' ' << a << " (" << s << ") " \
00249     << (f? "true": "false") << " ltext\n";
00250 }

00252 inline void psstream_impl::rtext_textproc(double x, double y, double r, \
00253   double a, const char* s, bool f)
00254 {
00255   textproc();
00256   out << x << ' ' << y << ' ' << r << ' ' << a << " (" << s << ") " \
00257     << (f? "true": "false") << " rtext\n";

00260 inline void psstream_impl::s_tolerance(double s)
00261 {
00262   out << "/s_tolerance " << s << " def\n";
00263 }
00264 
00265 inline void psstream_impl::trifill(double x1, double y1, double g1, double o1, double w1,
00266   double x2, double y2, double g2, double o2, double w2, double x3, double y3, double g3, 
00267   double o3, double w3)
00268 {
00269   lerpproc();
00270   out << x1 << ' ' << y1 << ' ' << g1 << ' ' << o1 << ' ' << w1 << ' ' << x2 << ' ' << y2 << ' ' 
00271     << g2 << ' ' << o2 << ' ' << w2 << ' ' << x3 << ' ' << y3 << ' ' << g3 << ' ' << o3 << ' '
00272     << w3 << " trifill\n";
00273   
00274   updatebb(std::min(std::min(x1, x2), x3), 
00275     std::max(std::max(x1, x2), x3), 
00276     std::min(std::min(y1, y2), y3),
00277     std::max(std::max(y1, y2), y3));
00278 }
00279 
00280 inline void psstream_impl::quadfill(double x1, double y1, double g1, double o1, double w1,
00281   double x2, double y2, double g2, double o2, double w2, double x3, double y3, double g3, 
00282   double o3, double w3, double x4, double y4, double g4, double o4, double w4)
00283 {
00284   lerpproc();
00285   out << x1 << ' ' << y1 << ' ' << g1 << ' ' << o1 << ' ' << w1 << ' ' << x2 << ' ' << y2 << ' ' 
00286     << g2 << ' ' << o2 << ' ' << w2 << ' ' << x3 << ' ' << y3 << ' ' << g3 << ' ' << o3 << ' '
00287     << w3 << ' ' << x4 << ' ' << y4 << ' ' << g4 << ' ' << o4 << ' ' << w4 << " quadfill\n";
00288   
00289   updatebb(std::min(std::min(x1, x2), std::min(x3, x4)), 
00290     std::max(std::max(x1, x2), std::max(x3, x4)), 
00291     std::min(std::min(y1, y2), std::min(y3, y4)),
00292     std::max(std::max(y1, y2), std::max(y3, y4)));
00293 }
00294 
00295 inline void psstream_impl::pixelplot(int cx, int cy, const float* xx, const float* yy,
00296   const float* gg, const float* oo, const float* ww)
00297 {
00298   if (cx * cy > 65535)
00299   {
00300     int ny = (cy >> 1);
00301     int d = cx * (ny-1);
00302     pixelplot(cx, ny, xx, yy, gg, oo, ww);
00303     pixelplot(cx, cy-ny+1, xx+d, yy+d, gg+d, oo+d, ww+d);
00304   }
00305   else
00306   {
00307     lerpproc();
00308     initarray();
00309     s_tolerance(5.0);
00310     int i, nn = cx * cy;
00311     out << cx << ' ' << cy << '\n' << nn << " array initarray";
00312     for (i = 0; i < nn; ++i)
00313     {
00314       out << (i % 10 != 0? ' ': '\n') << xx[i];
00315     }
00316     out << '\n' << nn << " array initarray";
00317     for (i = 0; i < nn; ++i)
00318     {
00319       out << (i % 10 != 0? ' ': '\n') << yy[i];
00320     }
00321     out << '\n' << nn << " array initarray";
00322     for (i = 0; i < nn; ++i)
00323     {
00324       out << (i % 10 != 0? ' ': '\n') << gg[i];
00325     }
00326     out << '\n' << nn << " array initarray";
00327     for (i = 0; i < nn; ++i)
00328     {
00329       out << (i % 10 != 0? ' ': '\n') << oo[i];
00330     }
00331     out << '\n' << nn << " array initarray";
00332     for (i = 0; i < nn; ++i)
00333     {
00334       out << (i % 10 != 0? ' ': '\n') << ww[i];
00335     }
00336     out << "\npixelplot\n";
00337 
00338     updatebb(*std::min_element(xx, xx+nn), *std::max_element(xx, xx+nn),
00339       *std::min_element(yy, yy+nn), *std::max_element(yy, yy+nn));
00340   }
00341 }
00342 
00343 inline void psstream_impl::horizontal_scale(int start, int step, int final, double orig, 
00344   double range, double dx, double x0, double y0, double sy)
00345 {
00346   out << start << ' ' << step << ' ' << final << " { " << orig << " sub\n"
00347     << range << " div " << dx << " mul " << x0 << " add " << y0 << " moveto 0\n"
00348     << sy << " rlineto stroke } for\n";
00349 
00350   updatebb(x0, x0+dx, std::min(y0, y0+sy), std::max(y0, y0+sy));
00351 }
00352 
00353 inline void psstream_impl::vertical_scale(int start, int step, int final, double orig, \
00354   double range, double dy, double x0, double y0, double sx)
00355 {
00356   out << start << ' ' << step << ' ' << final << " { " << orig << " sub\n"
00357     << range << " div " << dy << " mul " << y0 << " add " << x0 << " exch moveto\n"
00358     << sx << " 0 rlineto stroke } for\n";
00359   updatebb(std::min(x0, x0+sx), std::max(x0, x0+sx), y0, y0+dy);
00360 }
00361 
00362 inline void psstream_impl::setcolorspace(double line_width, double scale_factor)
00363 {
00364   pattern_line_width = line_width;
00365   pattern_scale_factor = scale_factor;
00366   out << "[/Pattern /DeviceRGB] setcolorspace\n";
00367 }

00369 inline void psstream_impl::setcolor(double r, double g, double b, psstream::Pattern h)
00370 {
00371   static const char* pattern[psstream::NUM_PATTERNS] =
00372   {
00373     "bdiagonal",
00374     "crosshatch",
00375     "diaghatch",
00376     "horizontal",
00377     "fdiagonal",
00378     "vertical",
00379     "sandstone",
00380     "shale",
00381     "limestone",
00382     "dolomite",
00383     "silicate",
00384     "salt",
00385     "anhydrite",
00386     "siltstone",
00387     "bitumen",
00388     "oilzone",
00389     "watzone",
00390     "gaszone",
00391     "gypsum",
00392     "deepbase",
00393     "gasoilzone",
00394     "oilwatzone",
00395     "gaswatzone",
00396     "gasoilwatzone",
00397     "watgaszone",
00398     "watoilzone",
00399     "oilgaszone",
00400     "sand",
00401     "coal"
00402   };
00403 
00404   if (!has_pattern[h])
00405   {
00406     static const char* proc[] = 
00407     {
00408       // bdiagonal
00409       "0.0 2.0 moveto 2.0 0.0 lineto\n"
00410       "0.0 4.0 moveto 4.0 0.0 lineto\n"
00411       "2.0 4.0 moveto 6.0 0.0 lineto\n"
00412       "4.0 4.0 moveto 6.0 2.0 lineto\n"
00413       "stroke",
00414 
00415       // crosshatch
00416       "0.0 0.0 moveto 0.0 4.0 lineto\n"
00417       "2.0 0.0 moveto 2.0 4.0 lineto\n"
00418       "4.0 0.0 moveto 4.0 4.0 lineto\n"

00422

00426       "2.0 4.0 moveto 6.0 0.0 lineto\n"
00427       "4.0 4.0 moveto 6.0 2.0 lineto\n"

00429       "0.0 0.0 moveto 4.0 4.0 lineto\n"

00675       "6.02792 2.99089 moveto 5.82792 2.99089 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00676       "1.42157 0.0775933 moveto 1.22157 0.0775933 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00677       "1.42157 4.07759 moveto 1.22157 4.07759 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00678       "1.24515 1.09631 moveto 1.04515 1.09631 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00679       "1.09948 2.26574 moveto 0.899481 2.26574 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00680       "1.20232 2.89869 moveto 1.00232 2.89869 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00681       "2.3545 0.262261 moveto 2.1545 0.262261 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00682       "2.48394 1.17274 moveto 2.28394 1.17274 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00683       "1.97846 2.04385 moveto 1.77846 2.04385 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00684       "2.40321 3.14897 moveto 2.20321 3.14897 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00685       "3.46913 0.249297 moveto 3.26913 0.249297 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00686       "3.348 0.851195 moveto 3.148 0.851195 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00687       "3.29292 1.96584 moveto 3.09292 1.96584 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00688       "3.09662 3.12403 moveto 2.89662 3.12403 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00689       "4.27719 0.127802 moveto 4.07719 0.127802 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00690       "4.27719 4.1278 moveto 4.07719 4.1278 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00691       "4.09734 0.769527 moveto 3.89734 0.769527 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00692       "4.27538 2.09581 moveto 4.07538 2.09581 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00693       "4.40519 2.71159 moveto 4.20519 2.71159 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00694       "4.94904 -0.114106 moveto 4.74904 -0.114106 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00695       "4.94904 3.88589 moveto 4.74904 3.88589 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00696       "5.07004 0.806607 moveto 4.87004 0.806607 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00697       "5.0104 1.81675 moveto 4.8104 1.81675 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00698       "5.06967 3.01971 moveto 4.86967 3.01971 0.2 0 360 arc\n"
00699       "fill",
00700 
00701       // coal
00702       "0 1 2 0.5 rectfill\n"
00703       "3 3 2 0.5 rectfill\n"
00704     };
00705 
00706     std::ofstream app(setup_section, std::ios::app);
00707     app << pattern_line_width << " setlinewidth\n";
00708     app << '/' << pattern[h] << " << /PatternType 1 /PaintType 2 /TilingType 1\n"
00709       "/BBox [ 0 0 6 4 ] /XStep 6 /YStep 4 /PaintProc { pop\n"
00710       << proc[h] << "\n} bind >> " << pattern_scale_factor 
00711       << ' ' << pattern_scale_factor << " matrix scale\n";
00712 
00713     if (orientation == psstream::LANDSCAPE)
00714     {
00715       app << "90 matrix rotate matrix concatmatrix\n"; 
00716     }
00717     app << "makepattern def\n";
00718 
00719     has_pattern[h] = true;
00720   }
00721   out << r << ' ' << g << ' ' << b << ' ' << pattern[h] << " setcolor\n";
00722 }

00780 void psstream::horizontal_scale(int start, int step, int final, double orig, 
00781   double range, double dx, double x0, double y0, double sy)
00782 {
00783   impl->horizontal_scale(start, step, final, orig, range, dx, x0, y0, sy);
00784 }
00785 
00786 void psstream::horizontal(const Scale& scale)
00787 {
00788   setgray(0.0);
00789   setlinewidth(scale.line_width);
00790 
00791   double margin = scale.margin;
00792   if (margin < 0.0)
00793   {
00794     margin = 0.0;
00795   }
00796 
00797   double axis_line;
00798   if (scale.region[1] < scale.region[3])
00799   {
00800     axis_line = scale.region[1] - margin;
00801     if (scale.flags & Scale::HAS_INNER_TICK)
00802     {
00803       axis_line -= scale.tick_length;
00804     }
00805   }
00806   else
00807   {
00808     axis_line = scale.region[1] + margin;
00809     if (scale.flags & Scale::HAS_INNER_TICK)
00810     {
00811       axis_line += scale.tick_length;
00812     }
00813   }
00814 
00815   if ((scale.flags & Scale::HAS_LABEL_TEXT) != 0 \
00816     && scale.font_name && scale.font_name[0] != '\0' \
00817     && scale.label != LABEL_NONE)
00818   {
00819     setfont(scale.font_name, scale.font_size);
00820 
00821     if (scale.label == LABEL_N && scale.region[1] < scale.region[3])
00822     {
00823       int start = (int) ceil(scale.range[0]);
00824       int final = (int) floor(scale.range[1]);
00825       double y = axis_line + scale.tick_length;
00826       for (int i = start; i <= final; ++i)
00827       {
00828         double bbox[4];
00829         char text[32];
00830         sprintf(text, "%d", i);
00831         double x = scale.region[0] + (scale.region[2] - scale.region[0]) \
00832           * (i - scale.range[0]) / (scale.range[1] - scale.range[0]);
00833         label(*this, x, y, scale.line_width, LABEL_N, true, text, bbox);
00834       }
00835     }
00836     if (scale.label == LABEL_S && scale.region[1] > scale.region[3])
00837     {
00838       int start = (int) ceil(scale.range[0]);
00839       int final = (int) floor(scale.range[1]);
00840       double y = axis_line - scale.tick_length;
00841       for (int i = start; i <= final; ++i)
00842       {
00843         double bbox[4];
00844         char text[32];
00845         sprintf(text, "%d", i);
00846         double x = scale.region[0] + (scale.region[2] - scale.region[0]) \
00847           * (i - scale.range[0]) / (scale.range[1] - scale.range[0]);
00848         label(*this, x, y, scale.line_width, LABEL_S, true, text, bbox);
00849       }
00850     }
00851     if ((scale.label == LABEL_E || scale.label == LABEL_NE) \
00852       && scale.region[1] < scale.region[3] && scale.region[0] < scale.region[2]
00853       || (scale.label == LABEL_W || scale.label == LABEL_NW) \
00854       && scale.region[1] < scale.region[3] && scale.region[0] > scale.region[2])
00855     {
00856       int start = (int) ceil(scale.range[0]);
00857       int final = (int) floor(scale.range[1]);
00858       double y = axis_line + scale.tick_length;
00859       for (int i = start; i <= final; ++i)
00860       {
00861         double bbox[8];
00862         char text[32];
00863         sprintf(text, "%d", i);
00864         double x = scale.region[0] + (scale.region[2] - scale.region[0]) \
00865           * (i - scale.range[0]) / (scale.range[1] - scale.range[0]);
00866         annot(x, y, scale.line_width, 270.0, ANNOT_LEFT, true, text, bbox);
00867       }
00868     }
00869     if ((scale.label == LABEL_W || scale.label == LABEL_SW) \
00870       && scale.region[1] > scale.region[3] && scale.region[0] > scale.region[2])
00871     {
00872       int start = (int) ceil(scale.range[0]);
00873       int final = (int) floor(scale.range[1]);
00874       double y = axis_line + scale.tick_length;
00875       for (int i = start; i <= final; ++i)
00876       {
00877         double bbox[8];
00878         char text[32];
00879         sprintf(text, "%d", i);
00880         double x = scale.region[0] + (scale.region[2] - scale.region[0]) \
00881           * (i - scale.range[0]) / (scale.range[1] - scale.range[0]);
00882         annot(x, y, scale.line_width, 90.0, ANNOT_RIGHT, true, text, bbox);
00883       }
00884     }
00885   }
00886 
00887   if (scale.flags & Scale::HAS_INNER_FRAME)
00888   {
00889     rectstroke(scale.region[0], scale.region[1], \
00890       scale.region[2] - scale.region[0], scale.region[3] - scale.region[1]);
00891   }
00892 
00893   if ((scale.flags & Scale::HAS_OUTER_FRAME) != 0 \
00894     && (margin > 0.0 || (scale.flags & Scale::HAS_INNER_FRAME) == 0))
00895   {
00896     double region[4];
00897     if (scale.region[0] < scale.region[2])
00898     {
00899       region[0] = scale.region[0] - margin;
00900       region[2] = scale.region[2] + margin;
00901     }
00902     else
00903     {
00904       region[0] = scale.region[0] + margin;
00905       region[2] = scale.region[2] - margin;
00906     }
00907     if (scale.region[1] < scale.region[3])
00908     {
00909       region[1] = axis_line;
00910       region[3] = scale.region[3] + margin;
00911     }
00912     else
00913     {
00914       region[1] = axis_line;
00915       region[3] = scale.region[3] - margin;
00916     }
00917     rectstroke(region[0], region[1], \
00918       region[2] - region[0], region[3] - region[1]);
00919   }
00920   else if (scale.flags & Scale::HAS_AXIS_LINE)
00921   {
00922     moveto(scale.region[0], axis_line);
00923     lineto(scale.region[2], axis_line);
00924     stroke();
00925   }
00926 
00927   if (scale.flags & (Scale::HAS_INNER_TICK | Scale::HAS_OUTER_TICK))
00928   {
00929     if (scale.type == Scale::ARITHMETIC)
00930     {
00931       double tick_length = scale.tick_length;
00932       if (scale.region[1] > scale.region[3])
00933       {
00934         tick_length = -tick_length;
00935       }
00936       double y0 = axis_line;
00937       if (scale.flags & Scale::HAS_OUTER_TICK)
00938       {
00939         y0 -= tick_length;
00940         if (scale.flags & Scale::HAS_INNER_TICK)
00941         {
00942           tick_length *= 2.0;
00943         }
00944       }
00945       int start = (int) ceil(scale.range[0]);
00946       int final = (int) floor(scale.range[1]);
00947       impl->horizontal_scale(start, 1, final, scale.range[0], \
00948         scale.range[1] - scale.range[0], scale.region[2] - scale.region[0], \
00949         scale.region[0], y0, tick_length);
00950     }
00951     else if (scale.type == Scale::LOGARITHMIC)
00952     {
00953     }
00954     else if (scale.type == Scale::PROBABILITY)
00955     {
00956     }
00957   }
00958 
00959   if (scale.flags & Scale::HAS_GRID_LINES)
00960   {
00961     int start = (int) ceil(scale.range[0]);
00962     int final = (int) floor(scale.range[1]);
00963     impl->horizontal_scale(start, 1, final, scale.range[0], \
00964       scale.range[1] - scale.range[0], scale.region[2] - scale.region[0], \
00965       scale.region[0], scale.region[1], scale.region[3] - scale.region[1]);   
00966   }
00967 
00968 }
00969

00973 {
00974   impl->vertical_scale(start, step, final, orig, range, dy, x0, y0, sx);
00975 }
